House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00063
FULL TITLE : AN ACT STRENGTHENING THE RIGHT OF CITIZENS TO INFORMATION HELD BY THE GOVERNMENT
SHORT TITLE : People’s Freedom Of Information Act
ABSTRACT : Proposes to implement the right of the people to information on matters of public concern guaranteed in the aforementioned provision of the Constitution as well as adopting the policy of full public disclosure of all transactions in the government involving public interest, and; seeks to deter employees and officials of the government in entering into clandestine and often onerous transactions which debilitate the integrity of the governmental institutions they work for.
